item.description:
Let's do a scenic ride down Rt. 117.
We'll meet at the Newton Marriott at 9am and head out at 9:15 to Rt 117 in Waltham and follow it to Rt.110 where we'll head down to the Wachusett Reservoir and go around it Let's take our time and enjoy the scenery an take a ton of pictures for the groups photo album. When we get to the southern end of the reservoir we'll go a short distance down Rt.140 to a place called Finders Pub (They open at 11:30) and have some lunch.
This place is great! They've got a great selection of all kinds of food and drinks plus FREE popcorn AND peanuts!
There, we will decide to go back or keep on going. If some want to go back and some want to keep going we can split up into 2 groups.

If it's RAINING I will move it to Sunday. If it looks like RAIN all weekend I'll re-schedule the event.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Scooters parked at the front entrance
item.name: Scenic Ride Down Rt. 117
